mapper.sql: id, file_name, open_file, del_flag, ys_master_task_id, file_content, user_id, dayrep_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into ys_day_rep (file_name, open_file, del_flag, ys_file_type_id, ys_master_task_id, file_content, user_id, dayrep_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openFile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ysMasterTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dayrepTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

file_name,
open_file,
del_flag,
ys_master_task_id,
file_content,

dayrep_time,

mapper.update:
update ys_day_rep
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_file = #{openFile,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ys_master_task_id = #{ysMasterTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_content = #{fileContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dayrep_time = #{dayrepTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ys_day_rep set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_file = #{openFile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ys_master_task_id = #{ysMasterTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_content = #{fileContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dayrep_time = #{dayrepTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT ydr.id, ydr.file_name AS fileName, ymt.name AS masterTaskName, ymt.id AS ysMasterTaskId, ydr.file_content AS fileContent, ydr.dayrep_time AS dayrepTime, yfb.feed_content AS feedContent, ysrf.id fileId, ysrf.day_rep_id AS fileMasterId, ysrf.name, ysrf.file_md5 fileMd5 FROM ys_day_rep ydr LEFT JOIN ys_master_task ymt ON ydr.ys_master_task_id = ymt.id LEFT JOIN ys_day_rep_file ysrf ON ydr.id = ysrf.day_rep_id LEFT JOIN ys_feed_back yfb ON yfb.day_rep_id = ydr.id WHERE 1=1
and ydr.id=#{id}

SELECT ydrf.id, ydrf.name AS fjName, ydrf.file_url AS fileUrl, ydrf.file_size AS fileSize FROM ys_day_rep_file ydrf LEFT JOIN ys_day_rep ydr ON ydr.id = ydrf.day_rep_id WHERE ydr.id = #{id} AND ydrf.del_flag = 0
